name: Zombie Truck
description:
Crush your way through endless amount of Zombies and Smashables standing in your way to reach the finish flag!

Earn score by crushing as many Zombies and Smashables as quickly as you can to unlock new levels!

Complete Truck Tasks to unlock bigger and better trucks to get even better scores!

Features:
- Unique Single and Multiplayer game modes
- Seamless Facebook integration to Challenge your friends
- Two addictive Multiplayer game modes; Challenge Multplayer and Live Multiplayer mode
- Complete given tasks to unlock new trucks
- Simple and easy to use controls
- 5 different worlds
- 70 unique and challenging levels
